General_Description: '''No Time for Scouts''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: A spy sent the wrong code and then waited too long to give a warning before [[Athens|Athenian]] [[ship]]s approached, so she begged for help. No record exists of her next assignment.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
